ygData.subject: RE: You are all wrong
ygData.msgSnippet: Thanks for the support guys, I have asked my detractor to please keep such responses to my personal email if he s going to make it personal.  How on earth did
ygData.messageBody:
Thanks for the support guys, I have asked my detractor to please keep such
responses to my personal email if he's going to make it personal. How on
earth did he get the idea I was only 12th level? Even my bard (not my
highest level character) is higher than that and has been since May.

Kitasi the bewildered

From: "Bard" <dabard@...>

"Are you just a stupid XXX XXXX? I am so sick and tired of all these
crybabies who has raised up one character to level 12 and thinks their class
is underpowered. All your facts are so screwed up"

If you are tired of it, then get yourself removed from the list. After
that little temper tantrum/demonstration of your grasp of the english
language, I'm sure you won't be missed much.

-=B=-
Trying hard not to flame
